metadata.name: The Final Moment #2
metadata.description: The Final Moment NFT project is a collection of digital art pieces that captures the poignant and solemn moments of human existence, when life slips away from the mortal realm. Each piece in the collection depicts a unique death scene, featuring the last breath of a person taken through murder, suicide or natural causes. These moments, frozen in time through the medium of digital art, offer a reflection on the fragility and preciousness of human life.
